mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookreview (isbn, bookName, bookIntro, bookImg, bookUrl, userSeq, bookRev) VALUES(#{isbn}, #{title}, #{bookIntro}, #{bookImg}, #{bookUrl}, #{userSeq}, #{bookRev})
mapper.select: SELECT b.reviewSeq, b.bookName, b.bookImg, b.enrollDate, u.userId FROM bookreview b, userinfo u WHERE b.userSeq = u.userSeq ORDER BY b.reviewSeq desc
SELECT b.reviewSeq, b.bookName, b.bookImg, b.enrollDate, u.userId FROM bookreview b, userinfo u WHERE b.userSeq = u.userSeq AND b.userSeq = #{value} ORDER BY b.reviewSeq desc
